response.name: List Company

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X POST http://example.com/api/claims \
    -F "category=Medical" \
    -F "date=2024-05-22T15:04:05Z" \
    -F "currency=USD" \
    -F "amount=1000" \
    -F "description=Medical expenses" \
    -F "document=@/path/to/document.pdf" \
    -F "IDEmploye=123" \
    -F "URLDocument=http://example.com/documents/document.pdf"

Generated from cURL: curl -X POST http://yourapi.com/updateClaim \
    -F "category=Travel" \
    -F "date=2024-05-22T14:48:00Z" \
    -F "currency=USD" \
    -F "amount=5000" \
    -F "description=Travel expenses for business trip" \
    -F "document=@path/to/your/document.pdf" \
    -F "id_claim=123" \
    -F "id_employe=456" \
    -F "url_document=https://example.com/document.pdf"
